name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori plays the garage scene in Resident Evil 7 VR, fighting against Jack Baker.
Koyori reflects on the VR experience in her 3D studio and prepares to head to the live venue.
Performance of the song 'Okochama Sensou' featuring Sakura Miko.

subtitles.original: うわー！
subtitles.english: Uwaah!

subtitles.original: 行け、おじさん！
subtitles.english: Go, Uncle!

subtitles.original: うわー！
subtitles.english: Uwaah!

subtitles.original: やったぜ、おい！
subtitles.english: I did it, hey!

subtitles.original: おじさん、行け！
subtitles.english: Uncle, go!

subtitles.original: やった、やったぞ、やったぞ！
subtitles.english: I did it, I did it, I did it!

subtitles.original: ここまでやれば大丈夫じゃね？
subtitles.english: It should be fine after all this, right?

subtitles.original: どう？
subtitles.english: How's that?

subtitles.original: うわ！え、嘘、上にいんの？
subtitles.english: Whoa! Wait, no way, you're on top?

subtitles.original: 上にいんの？上にいる！やめて！
subtitles.english: You're on top? You're on top! Stop it!

subtitles.original: いい車持ってんじゃないか。
subtitles.english: You got a nice car there.

subtitles.original: うわー！それおじさんの車！
subtitles.english: Uwaah! That's your car, Uncle!

subtitles.original: すごい！触れる！
subtitles.english: Amazing! I can touch it!

subtitles.original: あ、触れ... 触れてるような触れてないような...
subtitles.english: Ah, I can... It feels like I'm touching it, but maybe not...

subtitles.original: あー、おじさん！おじさん！
subtitles.english: Ah, Uncle! Uncle!

subtitles.original: もう終わりにしよう、俺たちで。
subtitles.english: Let's end this, between us.

subtitles.original: おい、何しやがる！
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you doing!

subtitles.original: やめろ！
subtitles.english: Stop it!

subtitles.original: やめろー！
subtitles.english: Stop it!

subtitles.original: やめろー！痛いー！
subtitles.english: Stop it! It hurts!

subtitles.original: あ、やった。
subtitles.english: Oh, I did it.

subtitles.original: おじさん？
subtitles.english: Uncle?

subtitles.original: おじさん起き上がるよ。
subtitles.english: Uncle's getting back up.

subtitles.original: あー、おじさん！
subtitles.english: Ah, Uncle!

subtitles.original: おい、お前、どうしてくれてんだよ、このクソ野郎めが！
subtitles.english: Hey you, what the hell have you done, you piece of shit!

subtitles.original: うそ、うそ。
subtitles.english: No way, no way.

subtitles.original: 燃えてる！うわー！
subtitles.english: He's on fire! Uwaah!

subtitles.original: おじさん一時期やったと思ったが...
subtitles.english: I thought I got him for a moment, but...

subtitles.original: これなら、これならもう大丈夫やろ。
subtitles.english: Surely, surely it's fine now.

subtitles.original: おじさんいい顔してんな。
subtitles.english: You have a good look on your face, Uncle.

subtitles.original: これで助手君も笑顔になってくれたかな。
subtitles.english: I hope this put a smile on your faces too, Assistants.

subtitles.original: いや、VRやったことあっても怖！
subtitles.english: Man, even if you've played VR before, it's scary!

subtitles.original: やったよ、助手君ー！
subtitles.english: I did it, Assistants!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 試練クリア！
subtitles.english: Trial Clear!

subtitles.original: はい！ということでバイオハザード7 VRやらせていただきました！
subtitles.english: Yes! And that was Resident Evil 7 VR!

subtitles.original: いや、すでにプレイしてたからまだできたけど...
subtitles.english: Man, I'd already played it, so I could handle it, but...

subtitles.original: これ初プレイだったらダメだ、死んどる。
subtitles.english: If this was my first time, I'd be dead for sure.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでですね、今はものすごいかいつまんだものだったんですけど...
subtitles.english: So, that was just a very condensed version...

subtitles.original: どこかで何かしらの形でね、ちょっと長いバージョンも公開しようと思ってるので、
subtitles.english: I'm planning to release a longer version somehow at some point,

subtitles.original: それもぜひ見てください！
subtitles.english: so please look forward to that too!

subtitles.original: お、試練をクリアしたので...
subtitles.english: Oh, since I cleared the trial...

subtitles.original: なんと！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not!

subtitles.original: ライブ会場でまた別のあの人が待ってるかもしれません！だって。
subtitles.english: Someone else might be waiting for me at the live venue! It says.

subtitles.original: よし！じゃあ急いで行かなくちゃ！行くよー！
subtitles.english: Alright! Then I better hurry over! Here I go!

subtitles.original: 昔々 そのまた昔...
subtitles.english: Once upon a time, long, long ago...

subtitles.original: とある貴族の仲良しな兄弟...
subtitles.english: There were two siblings from a noble family...

subtitles.original: ぎゃーくーしょー！
subtitles.english: In-ver-sion!

subtitles.original: ちゃんとやれ！
subtitles.english: Do it right!

subtitles.original: じいやが呼ぶ 席につけ
subtitles.english: Butler is calling, take your seats.

subtitles.original: よーいどん！
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go!

subtitles.original: ナイフとフォークで応戦いたしますの
subtitles.english: We'll fight back with knives and forks.

subtitles.original: だって僕らはブルジョアの
subtitles.english: Because we're bourgeois,

subtitles.original: 立派な立派な貴族様なんですもの
subtitles.english: Very fine and noble aristocrats.

subtitles.original: ひれ伏せ愚民 君との違いを
subtitles.english: Kneel, commoners, and let me show you

subtitles.original: ヴァイヴァイスロイ 見せてやるぜ
subtitles.english: The difference between us, vice-royally.

subtitles.original: まてまて まて勝手にそんな
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, don't just go ahead and...

subtitles.original: 見抜けるようなハッタリかまして
subtitles.english: Try to pull a bluff so easy to see through.

subtitles.original: はーい はーい はい はい
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: お兄様の仰せのままに（笑）
subtitles.english: Just as my brother commands (lol).

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so annoyed! Seriously annoyed!

subtitles.original: 兄に対して生意気な態度
subtitles.english: What a cheeky attitude toward your brother!

subtitles.original: 刻の声 ゴングを鳴らせ
subtitles.english: A battle cry, sound the gong,

subtitles.original: ケンカ勃発で宣戦布告
subtitles.english: A fight breaks out, a declaration of war!

subtitles.original: 悪戯して 悪魔に致して
subtitles.english: Playing pranks, being devilish,

subtitles.original: ほらほら 煽ってく Style で
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's the style to keep taunting.

subtitles.original: 大安売り 買っちゃったな
subtitles.english: A bargain sale, you've bought into it,

subtitles.original: 毎度ありがとうで君の負け！
subtitles.english: Thank you as always, and you lose!

subtitles.original: 拙い引き出しと 煽りあいの駆け引きで決める
subtitles.english: Settling it with poor tactics and taunting bargains.

subtitles.original: 兄の威厳 見せつけるため 飴と飴 火花散る
subtitles.english: To show my brotherly dignity, treats and treats, sparks fly.

subtitles.original: 両者の目と目
subtitles.english: Between the eyes of both parties.

subtitles.original: 俺を誰だと思ってる
subtitles.english: Who do you think I am?

subtitles.original: くらえ！おれさまがルールブック
subtitles.english: Take this! I'm the rulebook!

subtitles.original: へたれじゃない 勇気ない
subtitles.english: I'm not a coward, just lacking courage,

subtitles.original: ちょっと勇気が足りないだけ
subtitles.english: just lacking a little bit of courage.

subtitles.original: さあさあ お手を拝借
subtitles.english: Now then, lend me a hand,

subtitles.original: 当たり前だろ 余裕しゃくしゃく
subtitles.english: Naturally, I'm perfectly calm.

subtitles.original: 生まれながらにしてチート
subtitles.english: Born to be a cheat,

subtitles.original: やべぇ 煌めく人生がスタート
subtitles.english: Whoa, a glittering life begins.

subtitles.original: 当然です 見てみな遊色（ゆうしょく）はガチ勢
subtitles.english: Naturally, look, my colorful personality is hardcore.

subtitles.original: ハイ論破！ハイ論破！ハイ論破！
subtitles.english: Boom, refuted! Refuted! Refuted!

subtitles.original: もらってくぜブイサイン
subtitles.english: I'll take that V-sign!

subtitles.original: はーい はーい はい はい
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: はなまる よくできました☆
subtitles.english: Gold star, you did very well!

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so annoyed! Seriously annoyed!

subtitles.original: 僕に向かって減らず口なんざ
subtitles.english: Talking back to me like that,

subtitles.original: とっておきを君に見舞え
subtitles.english: I'll show you my best shot,

subtitles.original: 報復！制裁！挑発しちゃって
subtitles.english: Retaliation! Sanctions! Taunting you!

subtitles.original: 意地悪して 一枚上手
subtitles.english: Being mean, I'm one step ahead,

subtitles.original: チャンスはもらってくスタンスで
subtitles.english: With a stance of taking every chance.

subtitles.original: 痛恨ミス！あっちゃっちゃー
subtitles.english: A critical mistake! Oh boy,

subtitles.original: お生憎（あいにく）様だね君の負け！
subtitles.english: Tough luck for you, but you lose!
